statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT id, location_id, timestamp, temperature FROM environmental_data WHERE species_id = 5;
SELECT species_name, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, species_name FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature < 20 OR humidity > 80 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM environmental_data WHERE species_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data WHERE location_id = 1 AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT species_name, COUNT(*) FROM environmental_data GROUP BY species_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT location_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM environmental_data GROUP BY location_id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20;
SELECT DISTINCT species_name FROM environmental_data WHERE species_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_data ORDER BY humidity DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateMeasurements;
SELECT measurement_id, measurement_date, temperature FROM ClimateMeasurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, temperature, humidity FROM ClimateMeasurements WHERE location_name = 'Central Park';
SELECT * FROM ClimateMeasurements WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM BiodiversityRecords GROUP BY researcher_name ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateMeasurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_name, temperature FROM ClimateMeasurements WHERE humidity > 80
SELECT measurement_date, location_name, temperature FROM ClimateMeasurements WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT location_name, temperature, humidity FROM ClimateMeasurements WHERE location_name LIKE '%forest%'
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityRecords WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY observation_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location_id, measurement_time, temperature, humidity FROM climate_measurements;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_records WHERE habitat_type = 'forest';
SELECT site_name, country, latitude, longitude FROM research_sites ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, observation_date FROM biodiversity_records WHERE observation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT measurement_time, temperature FROM climate_measurements WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_measurements WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT location_id, measurement_time, temperature FROM climate_measurements WHERE location_id = 1 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type, observation_date FROM biodiversity_records WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT site_name, country FROM research_sites WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_sites WHERE country = 'USA' OR country = 'Canada' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM climate_measurements;
SELECT id, measurement_date, humidity FROM climate_measurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, region FROM biodiversity_records WHERE abundance > 100;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, affiliation FROM research_scientists ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM climate_measurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM climate_measurements WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT species_name, region, abundance FROM biodiversity_records WHERE region LIKE 'North%'
SELECT full_name, affiliation FROM research_scientists WHERE affiliation IN ('University A', 'University B')
SELECT id, location, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM ClimateMeasurements;
SELECT species_name, population, habitat, date_observed FROM BiodiversityRecords ORDER BY date_observed DESC;
SELECT name, specialization, institution, email FROM ResearchScientists WHERE specialization = 'Ecology';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, lead_scientist_id FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_name, type, description, url FROM DataSources WHERE type = 'API' ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateMeasurements WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, location, temperature FROM ClimateMeasurements WHERE location = 'Paris' AND temperature < 20 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT species_name, population FROM BiodiversityRecords WHERE population > 1000 ORDER BY species_name
SELECT * FROM ResearchScientists WHERE specialization = 'Ecology' AND institution = 'ABC University' ORDER BY name
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date
